mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.boardcnt, m.commentcnt, m.grade FROM tbl_toonalyst_score s, tbl_toonalyst_member m WHERE s.sid = m.id AND titleid = #{titleId} ORDER BY SDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_toonalyst_score(sno, sid, scontent, sgood, titleid, sdate) VALUES (seq_toonalyst_score.NEXTVAL, #{sid}, #{scontent}, #{sgood}, #{titleId}, #{sdate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_TOONALYST_SCORE WHERE SID=#{sid} AND TITLEID = #{titleId} AND SDATE = (SELECT MAX(sdate) FROM TBL_TOONALYST_SCORE WHERE SID=#{sid} AND TITLEID = #{titleId})

select webtoon.titleid, nvl(score.good,0) as good, nvl(score.hate,0) as hate, nvl(score.total,0) as total from (select titleid, COUNT(DECODE(sgood, 'good',1)) as good ,COUNT(DECODE(sgood, 'hate',1)) as hate, count(*) as total from tbl_toonalyst_score GROUP BY titleid) score, tbl_webtoon webtoon where webtoon.titleid = #{titleId} and score.titleid(+) = webtoon.titleid

select webtoon.titleid, nvl(score.good,0) as good, nvl(score.hate,0) as hate, nvl(score.days,0) as days, nvl(score.total,0) as total from (select titleid, COUNT(DECODE(sgood, 'good',1)) as good ,COUNT(DECODE(sgood, 'hate',1)) as hate ,TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') as days, count(*) as total from tbl_toonalyst_score score GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), titleid ORDER by days desc) score, tbl_webtoon webtoon where webtoon.titleid = #{titleId} and score.titleid(+) = webtoon.titleid
